name: Warrior's Blessing
passives: Dealing damage to an enemy god provides 1 stack. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Getting a Kill or Assist on an Enemy god provides 3 stacks. At 15 Stacks Warrior's Blessing Evolves, gaining +15 Physical and Magical Protection.
stat_changes: +40 Health And Mana Restored Upon Damaging An Enemy God, 10s Cooldown
